movie.title: Adiós
movie.description_intro: City of Sevilla. Sevilla, Andalucía (south to Spain). The neighborhood of the Las 3.000 Viviendas (The 3,000 Homes or "The 3,000" for short) is a ruthless and cruel place where police, law and order have no power. In this underworld of drug and crime, Juan Santos is a con man with freedom supervised who goes out from the jail to celebrate with his wife Triana the First Communion of Estrella, their only daughter. But during the celebration, Juan's younger brother Chico and uncle Andrés appear as uninvited guests to offer Juan a business to pass drug into the jail. Rejecting it by fear to lose his prison privileges, Juan, Triana and Estrella back home in car when they have an accident being beaten by another car, killing the child. At the same time, veteran cop Manuel Santacana and younger partner Eli arrive to a murder scene to investigate the killing of four drug traffickers Romanians, finding in it the cops Barroso and his new partner rookie Nando, Manuel's son, being noticed about ...

movies.title: Ride Your Dream
movies.summary: Discover Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionized the two wheel's world and who, from an early age, had a dream: being world champion. A dream that came true.
movies.description_full: Discover Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionized the two wheel's world and who, from an early age, had a dream: being world champion. A dream that came true.

movies.title: Winter Sleep
movies.summary: Aydin, a former actor, runs a small hotel in central Anatolia with his young wife Nihal with whom he has a stormy relationship and his sister Necla who is suffering from her recent divorce. In winter as the snow begins to fall, the hotel turns into a shelter but also an inescapable place that fuels their animosities...

movies.title: Rent-a-Cat
movies.summary: A single woman runs a rent-a-cat service to provide companions for lonely people.
movies.description_full: A single woman runs a rent-a-cat service to provide companions for lonely people.
movies.synopsis: A single woman runs a rent-a-cat service to provide companions for lonely people.

movies.title: Die Hard 2
movies.summary: After the terrifying events in LA, John McClane (Willis) is about to go through it all again. A team of terrorists, led by Col. Stuart (Sadler) is holding the entire airport hostage. The terrorists are planning to rescue a drug lord from justice. In order to do so, they have seized control of all electrical equipment affecting all planes. With no runway lights available, all aircraft have to remain in the air, with fuel running low, McClane will need to be fast.
